knimeNode.name: Trend Line Cropper
knimeNode.shortDescription: Crops out a region following the trendling. Use the left and right margin to specify how many pixels left and right of the trendline will be removed. Due to the nature of trend lines, parameters for starting row and ending row are also provided.

fullDescription.intro: Crops out a region following the trendling. Use the left and right margin to specify how many pixels left and right of the trendline will be removed. Due to the nature of trend lines, parameters for starting row and ending row are also provided.
fullDescription.option: Which row to start cropping pixels from
Which row to finish cropping pixels at. -1 is the default, meaning it will crop to the end of each image
How many pixels left of the trend line to crop out
How many pixels right of the trend line to crop out

ports.inPort: Images (as formatted by the Trend Line node)
